title: 17th April 2018
subtitle: Transparency and More Coins!
body:
**TL;DR:** * Got some spare hash? **[Mine some Zelcash](/)**! It's live and blocks are already being mined. * LamboMoon rewriting the rules, ### Zelcash now available A promising project that's promising a development platform, a Proof-of-Stake element in the form of masternodes and of, of course is a mineable Proof-of-Work, equihash coin. Other key info: Block time: 2mins Block reward: 150 ZEL Total ZEL Supply: 210,000,000 [Website](https://zel.cash/) | [Announcement](https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2853688.0)

Start mining Zelcash

| ------|-------|----- host | **stratum+tcp://lambomoon.club** port | **3044** (low diff) port | **3144** (10000+ diff) password | _none_ ( for now 😉 ) ### Let's talk about transparency
